about_the_game:
Evolve is a cutting-edge benchmarking suite designed to push the limits of modern GPUs, we've implemented state of the art rendering techniques that are both seen in high-end games as well as techniques found more often in offline (movie) rendering while trying to bring them to real time.

We hope to impress you with our graphics, while we're measuring all there is to know about your GPU!

Evolve provides the ultimate toolkit for pushing your hardware to its limits:

  • Comprehensive scoring: evaluate your overclocking prowess across multiple categories, including acceleration structure build performance, ray tracing / traversal, rasterization, compute, and more

  • Detailed performance breakdown: gain deep insights into your system's performance with our frame-by-frame analysis

  • On screen display: give you a breakdown of vital GPU statistics such as temperature, voltage and wattage during a benchmark run!

Experience the future of gaming benchmarks:

  • Next-gen graphics: assess your rig's capabilities with cutting-edge ray tracing and path tracing technologies

  • Game-like workloads: EVOLVE focuses on delivering performance metrics that matter in real gaming scenarios, and has implemented techniques found in real games

  • Online leaderboards: compare your scores against gamers worldwide and climb the ranks

Dive deep into hardware performance with Evolve:

  • Multiple rendering techniques: explore path tracing and hybrid rendering methods

  • Energy consumption metrics: understand your system's power efficiency

  • Driver overhead analysis: gain insights into how different drivers impact your system's performance

  • Community engagement: join our Discord community to share results, tips, discuss hardware performance and overclocking techniques.

name: Evolve

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 4 core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 / AMD RX6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ray Tracing capable GPU required to run benchmark. 6GB VRAM minimal.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 8 core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3080 / AMD RX7700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ray Tracing capable GPU required to run benchmark. 8GB VRAM recommended.

short_description: Evolve is a cross-platform ray tracing benchmark for gamers, researchers, influencers, developers, and overclockers who want to get the most out of their hardware.
